description: The Ilyushin Il-28T is a torpedo bomber. The NATO reporting name is Beagle.
notes: Tail Guns. In addition to its fixed guns, there aircraft has a tail mount with two 23 mm NR-23 guns. It can fire into the 60- arc. It may return fire twice per game turn in response to a gun attacks or conduct a single attack. Roll to hit is 3/2/1 and no modifiers apply except target size. The AtA rating is 4. The ammunition is 6.0.
Tail gunner has no ejection seat and can only bail out.
loadnotes: Station 2 is the internal bomb bay. It may only carry twelve parachute illumination flares.
